text:
Hi All,

We are currently migrating a Wordpress application into HubSpot.
But the problem is now that we are unable to decide whether to go with - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/memberships|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/memberships>, for the - Registration/Log-In functionality of the website.
Or using LDAP and other integration would be preferable ?

Also if anyone of you has experienced any issues by using the above things with HubSpot please let us know too.

All these info will be much helpful for all of us.

Thanks & Regards,
Mohesh Borah
